articles.author: F1
articles.title: 2024 Emilia Romagna Grand Prix qualifying report and highlights: Verstappen grabs pole position in Imola ahead of Piastri and Norris | Formula 1® - Formula 1
articles.description: Max Verstappen has added to his run of pole positions by clinching P1 on the grid for the Emilia-Romagna Grand Prix, with the Dutchman triumphing over his rivals with an unbeatable lap in Imola.
articles.content: Piastri put himself at the top of the timesheets as Q1 reached its halfway point, with the Australian setting a lap of 1m 15.940s to go seven-hundredths clear of Verstappen in P2. Soon afterwards he … [+1186 chars]
